topic.title: Merge Users
topic.section:
The Merge Users feature, available from Press Management under the Users heading, allows the Press Manager to merge two user accounts into a single account, transferring edit assignments, submissions, and numerous other records from one account to the other and effectively deleting the first.

The following items are transferred:

  • Monograph authorship
  • Public comments on monographs
  • Monograph notes
  • Editor assignments and decisions
  • Review assignments
  • Layout editor assignments
  • Proofreader assignments
  • Monograph email and event log entries
  • Reviewer access keys
  • Roles

The following items are not transferred:

  • Sessions
  • Subscriptions
  • Notification status (i.e. whether the user has signed up to receive notifications about press news)
  • Editorial team memberships
  • Acquisitions Editor status on acquisitionsArrangements
  • User profile information (e.g. first name, last name, etc.)

This feature should be used with caution, as it is not reversible and involves the transfer of records from one user to another.
